item.title: Delay system? Separating packets?
item.dc:creator: @yobytruk yobytruk
item.description:
@yobytruk wrote:

[quote=“silabgarza, post:2, topic:286960”]eventmanager
but u probably dont have it, so i wuld say use process

case 2477:
pEmote = 2753;
TeleDELAY = 5;
break;

then in process…

if (TeleDELAY >= 2) {
TeleDELAY–; } else
if (TeleDELAY == 1) {
toX = 3105;
toY = 3496;
}

EDIT:
also, declare…
public boolean TeleDELAY = 0;[/quote]
dude ily… tysm. I worked that bit out myself
anyway how do I set the pEmote to normal again o.o? to make it stop jumping lol pEmote = 0?

item.title: Delay system? Separating packets?
item.dc:creator: @silabgarza silabgarza
item.description:
@silabgarza wrote:

eventmanager
but u probably dont have it, so i wuld say use process

case 2477:
pEmote = 2753;
TeleDELAY = 5;
break;

then in process…

if (TeleDELAY >= 2) {
TeleDELAY–; } else
if (TeleDELAY == 1) {
toX = 3105;
toY = 3496;
}

EDIT:
also, declare…
public boolean TeleDELAY = 0;

item.title: Delay system? Separating packets?
item.dc:creator: @yobytruk yobytruk
item.description:
@yobytruk wrote:

[code=javascript]case 2477:
	pEmote = 2753;
	/*I need something to delaay it, Everything I have tried it sends the teleport and emote in the same packet.
	 *So it teleports and I end up doing the emote at the place i teled too >.>
	 *If someone could help it would be great XD
	 */
	toX = 3105;
	toY = 3496;
break;

[/code]
Anyone have any ideas? Please?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 04, 2009, 02:27:15 am[/size][hr]My portal, Isn’t working so can somebody please answer ASAP :o
